description: The scene depicts a person lying motionless on the floor inside a room, near a chair and a closed door. A parrot in a cage perched on a stand is present in the room. The parrot appears to be repeating phrases associated with someone trying to gain entry to a house. The situation creates dark irony as the bird asks if anyone is home while a person is clearly within the room but unresponsive.
caption: “Knock, knock, knock ... ding-dong, ding-dong ... anybody home? ... knock, knock, knock ...”
